name: emotion-game
description: Emotion Game - A fun candy crush style game

scripts.build: npm run install-flutter && flutter build web --release
scripts.install-flutter: curl -o flutter.zip https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.24.5-stable.tar.xz && tar xf flutter_linux_3.24.5-stable.tar.xz && export PATH="$PATH:$PWD/flutter/bin" && flutter doctor
